room_features:
Room Features

The Superior room offers peaceful interior views and elegant three-fixture bathrooms. These 300 square foot rooms envelop guests in a discreet, peaceful retreat and are situated on floors 4 to 14. 

Bed & Bath Experience

Superior Rooms contain a king sized bed with a nightstand, electronic safe, Bose Wave studio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock. An executive writing desk and chair is located on the far side of the room.  An armchair with side table, 40’ wall mounted TV and console with minibar is located across the bed.  The Turkish marble clad bathroom features a pedestal sink, glass enclosed shower, plush bathrobes and towels.
short_info: The Superior room offers peaceful interior views and elegant three-fixture bathrooms. These 300 square foot rooms envelop guests in a discreet, peaceful retreat and are situated on floors 4 to 14.
additional-info: The Superior room offers peaceful interior views and elegant three-fixture bathrooms. These 300 square foot rooms envelop guests in a discreet, peaceful retreat and are situated on floors 4 to 14.
service_amenities:
Service includes 24 hour white gloved elevator attendants, Complimentary hotel Jaguar service subject to availability,  an Award-winning Les Clefs d'Or Concierge team to assist guests.

In-room comforts feature Complimentary high speed wi fi for upto 5 devices, 24 hour in-room dining service, Housekeeping daily service twice, Overnight complimentary shoe shine, Plush terry cloth robes & Pierre slippers, Exclusive Etro toiletries, On site 24-hour valet and hand-laundry services, complimentary dog amenities (for pets upto 15 pounds), Complimentary online newspapers and magazines on check in.  For a full list of our guest services and amenities click here.
title: Superior King Room Interior View
